name: Kick Man
description:
KICK THINGS

You are Kick Man, evil has awoken.

You only have ONE move, kicking, and ONE button, left mouse.

Use the mouse to aim and left click to KICK.

Destroy them all for great justice and rack up combos for a high score.

Hastily made for GMTK jam in less than 12 hours.

Music made by me using instruments from Cybernator.
